comments: a student just asked how to start an assignment, she started cackling like a witch and started mocking him. any future engineers, good luck! u cant avoid her but u can rate her! lol

ENGG 123 is not really a bad class, but Heidi sucks big time. She only teaches about 1/3 of the time during the semester thank god. Her lectures are useless. Everything she says just enrages me. I swear when she said she was done with her lectures there was at least a hundred silent fist pumps.

Hiedi is wonderful, her knowledge of engineering overflows from her bubbly personality onto the class. Her experience and major in medieval literature has expanded everyone\'s knowledge of engineering. She is well qualified and is a joyous professor .

If i could rate lower then a 1 i would that just shows how unclear of a teacher she is... also she always is redoing her assignments after you have already started then... overall not a good teacher at all... USELESS

Unbelievably rude. she can never be wrong and her assignments unsually have mistakes. you get and assignment and you will have 20 emails about things that need to be changed. dedicated, but i would not choose her again. ever
Very little good things to say
Well,what can I say.The worst prof I\'ve ever seen.That\'s it

Condescending, rude. Started a class by saying she made some mistakes on a poorly thought out assignment. I thought "well, at least she realizes it". She followed up by saying the mistake was her not dumbing it down enough for us to understand...
useless as those stairs in college west that lead to a brick wall

USELESS! She is the plague. Will give an assignment, then two days before it\'s due she\'ll post an example of how it was supposed to be done, leaving you to either redo the assignment completely, or just take the bad mark.

She was useless. If she starts a lecture, just leave. The assignments are marked with no consistency so theres no real point in trying. just hope you get an easy marker for the big assignments. She showed us her notes and we followed them as examples. She marked them wrong and we asked about it she talked but said nothing of value. she sucks
The worst. Condescending, snotty, boring, and worthless. None of her lectures will be of any use, and her assignments are marked by demons. avoid like the plague.

Horrible!...cant stand her, does not know how to teach, thinks because she has a masters she is smarter then everyone and her speech on plagerising makes it sound as though she know you will and she will catch you...If I ever have to take a class with her again....I will drop out...just hearing her talk makes me angry!STAY AWAY IF YOU CAN!!
